subject: AI & Agents
title: How Photo Apps Sort Your Memories
description: One-minute skill: How Photo Apps Sort Your Memories.

hook.text: Search 'beach sunset' in your photos and the right images appear â€” even though you never tagged them.

buildup.text: Photo apps run image classification models that label every picture automatically.

discovery.text: They detect faces, objects, locations, and even activities like 'birthday party' or 'hiking.'

twist.text: The AI sometimes groups strangers with your friends. It sees similarity, not identity.

climax.text: Apple and Google now run these models on-device to protect your privacy.

punchline.text: AI organizes your life better than you do.

quiz.question: How do photo apps find images by description?
options: AI models automatically classify objects and scenes in photos
